mapper.select: select airportnum, iata, continent, city, latitude, longitude, cityimg from airport
select flightnum, airplanename, productnum, departtime, arrivetime, sale from flight
select foodnum, foodtype, foodname, foodimg, foodcontent, foodingredient, foodprice from food
select peoplenum, peopletype, peoplesale from people
select productnum, depart, arrive, price, productcnt, sale, regdate from product
select seatreservenum, flightnum, seattype, seatno, reserved from seatreserve
